ThingDef.label: beagle
ThingDef.description: A small scent hound developed primarily to hunt hares. It's intelligence and loyalty make it a valuable companion on the hunt.

ThingDef.label: chihuahua
ThingDef.description: A smallest dog, just a little bit bigger than a rat. Back in ancient times considered to be reincarnations of different deities and are to this day considered sacred.

ThingDef.label: corgi
ThingDef.description: Historically used for cattle herding, Corgis quickly became popular on imperial worlds and are recognized as a symbol of royalty.

ThingDef.label: french bulldog
ThingDef.description: Originally used for bull-baiting, which is an act of pitting one species of animal against bulls, these bulldogs are fierce opponents and due to their small body-size, they are fast, agile and lethal.

ThingDef.label: german shepherd
ThingDef.description: A large sized working dog. Easy to train and good at following instructions, they are often seen accompanying glitterworld police forces and rimworld farmers.

ThingDef.label: great dane
ThingDef.description: One of the largest species of dogs, Great Danes are dignified, elegant and strong.

ThingDef.label: poodle
ThingDef.description: Large, pampered dogs, historically used for bird hunting, now mostly residing in imperial palaces and royal gardens.

ThingDef.label: pug
ThingDef.description: A small dog with physically distinctive features of a wrinkly, short-muzzled face, and curled tail. They are known for being extremely social and friendly, however due to years of genetic alterations they have a very short lifespan. Whatever life they have, they will always cheer up people around them.

ThingDef.label: rottweiler
ThingDef.description: A large domestic dog and one of the oldest herding breeds. Being one of the most hard working dogs, it is a perfect companions for farmers and cattle herders.

ThingDef.label: shih-tzu
ThingDef.description: An oriental toy dog, Shih-Tzu have extremely long and soft hair. While they are kind of useless, petting them provides people with great comfort.

ThingDef.label: welsh terrier
ThingDef.description: A hunting dog, welsh terriers are perfect for small rodents, foxes and badgers. Due to their intelligence they are perfect at way-finding, always able to return home after running into the woods.
